name: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
desc: Specifies the animation effects to apply when inserting or removing rows.

items.name: static var effectFade: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Use a fade for row or column removal. The effect can be combined with any of the slide constants.

items.name: static var effectGap: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Creates a gap for newly inserted rows. This is useful for drag and drop animations that animate to a newly opened gap and should be used in the delegate method tableView(_:acceptDrop:row:dropOperation:).

items.name: static var slideUp: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Animates a row insertion or removal by sliding upward.

items.name: static var slideDown: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Animates a row insertion or removal by sliding downward.

items.name: static var slideLeft: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Animates a row insertion by sliding from the left. Animates a row removal by sliding towards the left.

items.name: static var slideRight: NSTableView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Animates a row insertion by sliding from the right. Animates a row removal by sliding towards the right.
